_header: This is no life alas that I do lead
_description: On the Cruelties of his Mistress — three stanzas rhyme royal

CULFf16.First Lines:
This ys no lyf a las þat y do ledeit is but deth as yn lyves
                    lyckenesseEndeles sorow assured owte of dredePast all despeyre &
                    owte of all gladenesse…
CULFf16.Last Lines:
…for me no thyng may comforte nor amendeTyl deith come forthe
                    and make of me anende
CULFf16.Note:
Follows 1667 as if part
                    of same work.
